website_summaries.verdict: A simple and affordable foam climber set that is still durable and lots of fun.
pros: Set features bright colors and stairs and a slide
Pieces can connect together or be used separately
cons: Some buyers didn't receive the Velcro needed to attach the pieces together

customer_reviews.title: Good quality at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter (11 months) because she likes to climb. It’s sturdy, good quality, good size (not too big or small) and easy to clean. It was also a lot cheaper than similar products. She’ll be able to use it for a while, I’m satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Our youngest is a climber, so my husband thought we should get her something she is actually supposed to climb on for her first birthday. We don't have a designated playroom, so I was looking for something that wouldn't take up our entire living room. This is the perfect size for her! Both the one-year-old and our 3.5-year-old have had a blast climbing on this all day. It also seems really sturdy/good quality. The material looks like it will be easy to wipe down, but there are also zippers to remove the covers should they need to be washed. Really happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like how this is a soft material
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my nephew for his first birthday. He's a little spider monkey and climbs on everything. I like how this is a soft material, and low enough that he would have to try pretty hard to hurt himself on it. His mom likes that its easy to clean and doesn't take up a bunch of space. He loves that he can slide down it, and very quickly figured out how to get up the "slide" part. I do hope one day they come up with a slightly bigger version (if there is one I didn't see it)
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

customer_reviews.title: 1-year-old LOVES this, should last for years
customer_reviews.text: Wow! My just-turned-1-year-old grandson (who is quite a climber) absolutely LOVES this set! It's big enough to be fun, but not too big that you have to be "right there" for catching, if rolling off the sides happens. Fun to have ANY toys with wheels roll down the ramp. Nicely lightweight - to pick up and store when he's not here, or to vacuum. The quality is great, and price is very good, compared to similar items. Know that anything with quality foam inside IS going to be pricey- foam just happens to be expensive!
customer_reviews.author: M. Kanavas

customer_reviews.title: Great set for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves climbing on everything, so I was looking for an affordable foam set for him to play on. I came across this set and was so excited because everything else I saw was a little more expensive for the same thing. When it was shipped to us, my son immediately started playing on it and sliding down the ramp. To say he’s excited is an understatement. We love it and love the design. Very durable too!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley J

customer_reviews.title: Best $60 spent!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of purchasing these since there were no reviews but I decided to take the risk since the price was so great. I am SO happy I did! My 10 month old son LOVES these. They are super durable and seem like they will be easy to clean. I am extremely satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Austin Williams

customer_reviews.title: I don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this for your little ones because of the following reasons : 1. It is not study enough, my baby who is only one, is strong enough to move this around. 2. It does not have any adhesive or anything keeping the two together so it makes it dangerous, sometimes I’m in the kitchen and I turn around and there’s a huge whole in between where my daughter could easily hurt herself. 3. I think the last step is still too high, my daughter fell backwards and hit her head. Overall I think this product is not made thinking out the safety of our little ones so i wouldn’t recommend. I will be returning for sure.
customer_reviews.author: daniela cardenas

customer_reviews.title: My toddler loves it and so does my baby!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase to my play area for the kids. My toddler went up and down the steps and loves laying on the slide. My baby loves it to, uses it to support sit up and starting to use it to help stand up on knees! It’s perfect and soft and there is one Velcro piece to keep them together. No nasty smell or anything and came quickly! I would like to get more if I end up getting a bigger playroom later for my baby!
customer_reviews.author: Livelife7347

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed. I bought this for my son’s birthday in two days and obviously don’t have time to return and get a new one. It seems sturdy and mostly well-made, but the vinyl on top doesn’t fit the foam on the stairs. It hangs off just enough to cause a tripping hazard and is obviously a defect as the rest of the vinyl is tight-fitting (as it should be for toddlers who aren’t very graceful yet). I’m not sure if I’ll keep it just to have something for his birthday or what. Pretty bummed. Too much money to deal with something like this!
customer_reviews.author: HMurph

customer_reviews.title: Nice play toy, vinyl covering is loosedue to excess.
customer_reviews.text: Very foam blocks for my daughters to play on. Looks great but the foam is either too small or the vinyl wrap is too big so it looks loose which bothers me aesthetically. Size is accurate, they are a nice size for them. Still manageable when it comes to moving it around but large enough to climb on and roll down the ramp. Colors are bright and uniform. Stitching seems strong so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy B

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play on
customer_reviews.text: The velcro this comes with is poorly placed. It has a piece on the bottom of each foam piece and comes with one to connect them. They don't stay together well when being moved and the connecting piece is small making it hard to hold. All that being said, my son loves it and will sit on the stairs to eat his snacks or watch TV. He will play on it and roll anything with wheels down it and gets a lot of joy out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy and compact
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these climbers! We bought this and the tunnel to make a set for the summer, and they are awesome! We use them every day. They are sturdy and compact, so they don’t take up a huge amount of room. We split the piece of Velcro (provided) to keep them together, and there isn’t a problem keeping them together, even when my 5 year old plays on them. Great product and thanks!
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Happy I purchased this.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my eight month old granddaughter to use in her play yard to help her with learning to crawl and move. It has been a huge hit and she will spend lots of time and energy trying to climb up the step mat. Of course we have it up against wall and we are right there by her side to make sure she doesn't fall and get hurt but I think it is really helping with her muscle development and balance.
customer_reviews.author: pkd

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for my daughter learning to walk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a while ago when my daughter was learning to walk and they're so worth getting! She loved these and they helped a lot. I used to keep them out in my daughters room but she's now two years old and runs so we don't use it as much. When I do take them out, she loves it. They're safe, easy to clean and I have yet to find any tears on the product. great quality and totally worth getting to help motivate your little ones!
customer_reviews.author: Samm

customer_reviews.title: Great exploratory toy for learning to accept heights and practicing hand/leg/eye coordination
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a toddler learning to explore and crawl around. Our baby is 11 months old and was hesitant at first, but is beginning to learn to trust himself, and explore “heights” with this. It is soft and easy to clean. Update: 12 months old and is VERY active with this now. It is one of his favorite items to play with/on and he really is learning balance well, and I love that he knows this is the toy he allowed to crawl up and down and all over safely. It’s his little jungle.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Jones

customer_reviews.title: 10-Month Old Granddaughter Loved It.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't take much coaxing before our 10-month granddaughter started climbing over her new toy. She has just started to walk and found it easy to crawl over to and from wherever she is going testing out her new skills. Product appears to be durable and pretty well made.
customer_reviews.author: Beohbe1

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, baby bounces right off unscathed
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves to use these to stand up, and they’re cushioned enough that if he falls and hits them he just kind of gently bounces off. He’s been falling on these quite a bit, and he doesn’t hurt himself which is why we bought them. But now he wants to climb them and in a little scared, but that has nothing to do with the product or it’s quality. I feel like these will last for a few babies.
customer_reviews.author: Omni

customer_reviews.title: Our little one is now climbing
customer_reviews.text: I saw similar items to these at a daycare and saw 18-24 month olds climbing on them with ease so decided to get them for my 8.5 month old for when she is ready. She instantly attempted to climb the triangle shaped one and made it to the top after a few attempts and 2 weeks after purchase she was climbing the steps up and onto the couch. Now she's climbing all over the show and has started pulling up on the couch with help from the steps/incliner as an aid. She doesn't use them everyday but these have proven to be well worth the investment from what we have seen her do with them so far.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyArtnull

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday gift for 1 year-old
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our son for his first birthday and he loves it. We wanted to buy one gift that he would use a lot rather than a bunch of toys he'd grow out of really fast (and also prevent more clutter in our house). Personally, I think it's a little expensive for what it is but that's true of all foam climbing toys, and this one seemed reasonable by comparison to others I researched. It was worth it for all the use and fun we're getting out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Must have for fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is so much fun! We bought this for our 9 month old twins and they LOVE it! It is only about 1 - 1.5 ft tall, so I don’t have to worry about them hurting themselves on it later. It’s. Great way for them to practice stairs and standing up. It has ZERO chemically smell either. It has secured velcro to keep the two pieces together and it great quality. This is a must have
customer_reviews.author: Nagnot

customer_reviews.title: Lacking quality
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed as the outer shell is raising within the day I received the item. It’s super loose now and I’ve only had it 2 days I got rid of the orginal box so am having trouble returning it as this is a 3rd party seller. Not happy as this gym is pricy and would have expected better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for babies and toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my daughter for her first birthday and she has not stopped playing with it since. My 2.5 year old enjoys it as well to practice her gymnastics. Such a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe in time
customer_reviews.text: Since I've had it, my now 15 month old doesn't really find interest in it. It is sturdy, easy to clean and durable but she hasn't really played with it - it's a little small too I couldn't image any child over 2 having fun with it. She likes to lay on the slide with her bottle time to time but climbing up the stairs or even sliding down hasn't been achieved. For the price as well, should have been cheaper; considering it's size.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: My kids love these!
customer_reviews.text: Lobe these foam blocks! They are sturdy enough for my 5 year old to jump all over and easy to clean when my 11 month old drools or spits up on it. They're easy for my youngest to learn to climb on and I even lay on them when I'm on the floor with the kids. The blocks were a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Z

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I bought this one instead of spending 15-25$ more for the same size elsewhere! Soft enough for babies and the foam should be strong enough to grow with her as she gets older. Will be fun for outdoor activities in the summer as well with the water resistant material
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: All the kids in my life enjoy this soft climber, from 1-6 years old. The 1-year-old slides on her belly on the slide and often tries to climb the steps and falls often (but does not get hurt), the 3 year old does tumbles on it, and the 6-year-old jumps on and over it.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Krzywicki

customer_reviews.title: 100% Yes!
customer_reviews.text: So good! Purchased these for my very active nephew’s 1st birthday - he’s 3 now and they are still going strong! He has even ridden his Radioflyer trike down the wedge and it has kept it’s shape. The steps sometimes fee a little tipsy, but foam steps often do. I highly recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: Love this ramp
customer_reviews.text: If it’s one thing I don’t regret buying is this. Truly is the only thing my daughter will not get rid of, it has held up through a lot of jumping, climbing, eating on, spills and more. It’s held up great easy to clean wroth every penny. Great for toddlers starting to climb.
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES her stairs/ramp!! She loves to climb up and down, but she also just uses the steps to sit on while watching TV. It’s the perfect little spot to sit and eat her snack. I love that she can climb independently without having to worry about an injury. We’ve had several falls, but it’s close enough to the ground that she isn’t ever too upset. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing!!!! My son has early intervention 3 times a week for cerebral palsy (OT, PT, & EI) all 3 were so excited by this purchase, they couldn’t believe the price I paid and how well my son is doing on. He is starting to crawl up both sides and down!! Even his older sisters (3 & 7) love to play on it with him!! I would buy this ten times over for the advancements he has made with it!!! Now I just need add on pieces since these two do connect with included Velcro if wanted!!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Wallace

customer_reviews.title: VERY SMALL
customer_reviews.text: SO SMALL. I thought based on the photos provided of children on the actual item that this would work well for my child - no. My 11 month old can sit on the top with his feet on the ground. This is SMALL. If you're using it for a 6 month old, it's a great value. Otherwise invest in a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Z

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this! We have had for about 5 months and they are still going strong. My son is 1 now and loves climbing all over them. He moves them all around too. My nephew who is 7 enjoys using them to drive his cars up and down. I would recommend this to anyone who has a toddler who loves climbing.
customer_reviews.author: diehl23

customer_reviews.title: 7 month old loves it
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleasantly surprised to see my 7 month old son figure out how to climb the stairs in a matter of minutes. He army crawls and can pull himself up with help. I thought it would be a while before he could climb the stairs. He figured it out and loved it. It's a challenging exercise for him.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Big hit with my little one!!
customer_reviews.text: It's smaller than I thought it would be but that's okay because it's the perfect size for my 8 month old. I've had it put together for about 20 minutes so far and she loves it. Plus, it can hold my weight pretty well so I know it won't cave in under her.
customer_reviews.author: Histed

customer_reviews.title: 10 month old approved
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set and the accompanying tunnel from the same company for my 10 month old, now 11 months, and she absolutely loves it. She plays/climbs on it all day long. We change the configurations around with the tunnel to change it up - even flip the tunnel upside down. It’s an Indoor dream come true, especially since we spend most days inside during this COVID-19 lockdown.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I read a lot of reviews that said the items didn’t velcro together but they definitely do. I’m really glad I purchased this item! My daughter is 16 months old and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Must-have for active babies!!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this more stars, I would. My baby #4 is a real climber and this is a lifesaver as it gives him something safe to climb on instead of the furniture! I really don’t know why I never thought to get this when my other 3 were toddlers!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Bell

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: We got these for our 8, now 9 month old for Christmas. She absolutely loves them. Shes a little too young to be left unattended, so I play with her, but this has really taught her some depth perceptAl's related to falling. Its also a wonderful way to get her exercise and work those little muscles. Just after a month she has learned how to step off the side and to scoot down the angle to avoid falling. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Bridwell

customer_reviews.title: They really seemed to enjoy them and because they're very cushiony
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 sets of these for my 17 month and 3 1/2 year old grandchildren to play on when they come to our house. They really seemed to enjoy them and because they're very cushiony, there's little likelihood of them injuring themselves. I started out by buying one set, and then decided to buy another to expand the play area. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia M.

customer_reviews.title: Product isn’t square
customer_reviews.text: This had the potential to be the favorite toy, but the “slide” isn’t even close to square. Additionally we didn’t receive the Velcro to hold the 2 pieces together. My daughter likes the steps, but I don’t feel comfortable using the slide with them, it’s a shame because basically half of the product is unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 9 month old twins and they LOVE these. Instantly started climbing on them and haven’t stopped since I first put them on the floor. Soft on the outside but foam is firm and doesn’t collapse underneath them. Easy to wipe down. Best purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a year already and it’s pretty handy!!! My son now 2 jumps off the couch and I use it as his landing pad!!! Great for people downstairs cause it reduces the noise level! I bought it for his 1st bday and didn’t realize I’ll be using it for other things! Especially when you have a reckless daring son like mine!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cushion falls
customer_reviews.text: My baby and I love the foam stairs and triangle. They are soft and cushion the falls as the baby learns to climb them. Easy to clean material you can just wipe off. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Oxana

customer_reviews.title: Excellent indoor climbing toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 18 month toddler and she loves climbing on it! It’s the perfect size and not too large. Even my 5 yo loves to play on it. The tunnel can handle his weight standing on top and he can fit through the tunnel as well (laying flat of course).
customer_reviews.author: Devyn P

customer_reviews.title: Great for littles with hypotonia!
customer_reviews.text: This has been an excellent way for my baby girl with low muscle tone get some exercise and strengthen her muscles. And she loves crawling all over it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toddler indoor play mats!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 1year old granddaughter. She loves it! When my daughters friends come over, their kids love it too! My granddaughter is getting confidence of climbing and sliding down. She now slides toys down the slide experimenting. I’m so glad I found this!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: amazing product
customer_reviews.text: love having this set in our daughters room. we got it for her at 8 months, she is now 12 months and still loves it! We got the farm tunnel that is shown to go with it as well. love it!
customer_reviews.author: CeeCee

customer_reviews.title: Great for 1 year olds!
customer_reviews.text: My little loves this climber, and helped with her motor skills. It doesn’t take up too much room, and it’s easy to wipe down. These types of things can be pricey, and there are “flashier” ones out there with more frills, but they’re stupid expensive. This is a great deal for the price!
customer_reviews.author: M. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Big hit with grandson!!
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to my grandson for his first birthday. He absolutely loves it!! I needed something to allow him to safely climb, especially on rainy days. It is just the right size too. Since he lives with us, I see how often he climbs on it. Great addition for our very mobile grandson!
customer_reviews.author: T. Bordelon

customer_reviews.title: great price great quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy with this climber! I was a little hesitant to buy it since it was cheaper then the others on here. I’m glad I did though. It does not look or feel cheap at all. The quality is wonderful. It’s the perfect size for the playroom, and my 7 month old loves using it to pull herself up and stand!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Toy for Baby
customer_reviews.text: Love this and so did my baby. It was perfect for the age they start crawling and learning to pull themselves up. She would play non stop on it. And even now that she walks she still uses it.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Great for physical activity when your kids can’t get outside!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves this climbing set. We ordered it right before the quarantine, and he’s been playing on it every day. It’s holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kiersten

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughter just turned one. She loves to climb so we purchased this for her birthday. She absolutely loved climbing all over it.
customer_reviews.author: JLLo

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: My toddler's favorite thing is to climb and jump off of everything possible. The soft foam is perfect for this and proven very durable. I love that its easy clean and the velcro is sturdy enough to stay together, but can be taken apart and rearranged.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend this
customer_reviews.text: It is very important for me to express my gratitude for this product and recommend it to parent- my baby wasn’t pushing up until I bought this for her and thankfully soon within a week she started to push up with this product
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Our little one loves this! Not only for climbing but she loves sitting on the stairs. She’ll often just sit down and look at her books or play with some toys on it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily F

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a gift for our 1 year old. She loves it! It is great quality (a nice mixture of firm and soft, and the cover is strong and easy to clean). Our 3 and 6 year olds use it too, and it is holding up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Belin87

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and my son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and my son loves it. I wish I got it sooner, since he is already 22 months and it's a little small for him.But he loves to climb, so this works for now! It's a bit pricey, but bigger climbers that are similar cost much more!
customer_reviews.author: Vera R.

customer_reviews.title: Great.!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, I have purchase this for my puppy. And it’s really nice and the material is really thick. It looks like never is going to be destroy.! And also really easy to clean.!
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia R.

customer_reviews.title: My little climber loves it
customer_reviews.text: my 8 month old loves it. When it put together he climbs the stair and goes down the ramp. I put the stair part next to the couch and he loves climbing up the stairs to the couch. I would recommend to anyone how has a little one who loves to climb. Easy to clean just wipe it down with a Clorox wipe or soap and water.
customer_reviews.author: shannon white

customer_reviews.title: Playtastic!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely everything we wanted it to be. Our sone loves it! It added more activity options to a small living room.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey B

customer_reviews.title: We love these!!
customer_reviews.text: My almost 2 year old son and 7 year old daughter play on these all the time. They are a must have!!
customer_reviews.author: Sweethlc82

customer_reviews.title: Good for a baby thats crawls.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy for a crawler my daughter walks and she likes it but not enough to be entertained for 30 min.
customer_reviews.author: Ching Saetern

customer_reviews.title: All day play!
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old loves climbing on the foam blocks at daycare so I knew she’d love these. They’re not too big so they don’t overwhelm a space. She loves them! Best purchase I’ve made it a while for my squirmy girl.
customer_reviews.author: Rylee T.

customer_reviews.title: Toddler Safe!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a one year old child who loves playing on it. Very well constructed and not too large. Arrived in excellent condition. Well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: nanakicking

customer_reviews.title: So fun for kids! Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these! We bought it for our 15 month old son who loved to climb. It is a good height, so it isn't too high. The colors are really pretty and the foam has held up well. Our 4.5 year old plays and jumps on it, as well. The only con is the price. All of these foam blocks are way overpriced but they do hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Emery

customer_reviews.title: Perfect safe climbing practice
customer_reviews.text: Got these for our little one's first birthday. She (and her older cousins) enjoy climbing all over it. Husband and I sit on them too and they keep their shape well. Easy to stack and move out of the way, and they wipe clean. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Play with purpose
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase for working with our baby on gross motor skills. I wanted something similar to what we would use in a physical therapy session. So far he really loves playing on it and I can see how it will be good for building his strength
customer_reviews.author: Eileen W.

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves this play gym, we got it for him when he was around 8-9 months, he is 1 now and still loves using it!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: I Love These
customer_reviews.text: My son is 13 months and loves these! He often pushes the steps against the couch so he can climb up on his own. They are also very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Charlsie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for indoor exercise
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month + daughter loves this set! It has helped her improve her balance and practice walking on steps. It provides a lot of indoor physical activity for her.
customer_reviews.author: Suzee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for infants any age. They can use these to pull to stand, sit on or climb. It's still a lot of fun for my 15month old. It's not much of a slide, she does like to roll things down the ramp though.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Goldilocks Blocks - Just Right!
customer_reviews.text: Uncomplicated climbing blocks perfect for my toddler grandson’s small play room. Not to many blocks and no Ill-designed tunnel. The ABC motif has him singing the ABC song each time he sees them.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love these items. Colorful, durable, easy to clean and set up/break down. We also purchased the tunnel piece and it makes the perfect indoor playground for our toddler. Definitely worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel C

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice play mats. My son (15 months) loves them. They are easy to clean and seem very durable. This is my second Milliard product purchase (first was a crib mattress) and I've been very pleased with both!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Vickerman

customer_reviews.title: Good motor development toy
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, similar as the quality of ECR4kid products. My 7-month son likes to crawl and walk up (with my surppot) on it. Fun and good to motor development.
customer_reviews.author: TurtleNO

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for physical therapists
customer_reviews.text: Our physical therapist uses them with our son. He loves them they are great
customer_reviews.author: Finse

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase since the item had no reviews. We received ours today and my 1 year old loves it! It's bright and colorful without being obnoxious and he loves climbing on it and rolling down it. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: John Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Non complex toy for tons of fun
customer_reviews.text: My kids (10 month old and 2yr old) love this. It’s sturdy, easy to move around, and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Daniele

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 18mo. He loves it. Easy to wipe clean. Soft yet firm enough for him to safely climb and walk on.
customer_reviews.author: Glo

customer_reviews.title: The two pieces don’t connect
customer_reviews.text: Product was as expected; however, it does not come with the Velcro needed to connect the two pieces at the bottom. Some sort of no slip surface is needed or they’ll just slide around which can cause little ones to fall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for our toddler area inside of our indoor playground
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our toddler area inside of our indoor playground. The little ones can easily climb up the stairs and “slide” down the other side. Great quality and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Douglass

customer_reviews.title: Huge Fan
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to connect to the tunnel that is from the same company: fantastic! Both the 10 month old and the toddler are getting a lot of use out of it. 10 month old for pulling himself up and standing, the toddler because she is bouncy and energetic and wants to climb!
customer_reviews.author: Squid

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and soft but firm for my son to climb on. Super easy to clean and it’s adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Messinger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my godson for Christmas and he loves it! He’s 16 months and all over!
customer_reviews.author: Helena

customer_reviews.title: Great for any kid!
customer_reviews.text: This has been one of my child’s favorite toys. She uses them every day, and she has gotten so strong and fast on them. I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Ray

customer_reviews.title: Baby Gross Motor Skills
customer_reviews.text: My crawling baby loves these. We use them separate and together. Works best without socks.
customer_reviews.author: Alaina

customer_reviews.title: Great grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: 15 month old great grandson loves it and has fun..but it is a little expensive for what it is
customer_reviews.author: Dee Wie

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and put together. Used all the time in our house. The fabric is sturdy material, but not as tight fitting to the foam as I expected. Durable and appropriately priced.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Baumann

customer_reviews.title: Fun fun fun!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. My daughter loves to play and climb on it. Seems very sturdy and durable. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Genau

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy along with the the center block/tunnel. We've had it for a couple months and she still plays with it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased, read the other reviews and bought an adhesive Velcro strip for about 10 bucks to keep the top together when climbed. Our 9 mo old was apprehensive at first but now at 11 mo she loves it. I have laid on it in when playing with her and I weigh 170, it’s pretty resilient. Would recommend to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hohman

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be a little larger for toddlers to fully enjoy. On the positive the quality is excellent
customer_reviews.text: The product is smaller than what I expected. Needs to be a little larger for toddlers to fully enjoy. On the positive the quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Mindi V. Casuccio

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy made good and perfect size small  for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: It's small but the tiny tots love it we also put it together with the other sets we have to make 4 side island . Easy to clean, and great quality and color
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase so far!
customer_reviews.text: When we first received this, there was a defect in the seam. I contacted amazon to see if an exchange was possible. The seller was fantastic with correcting it immediately. The replacement has held up great with my two crazy tots
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: OMG, my son just loves this! he used it more and more every day. He's now 8 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia

customer_reviews.title: Our son's favorite activity!
customer_reviews.text: This climbing "toy" is fantastic. This is the best play purchase we've made for our little boy. It's not very high, which makes it ideal for him learning how to climb without fear of bad crashes. Very highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: The Webers

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what i wanted for my 8 month old grandson. Now he can climb on something sturdy and soft. I especially loved the fact it did not smell when I opened the box.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie E. Chivell

customer_reviews.title: Great for the little one!
customer_reviews.text: We're pleased with this item. Our crawler took to playing on it right away. We just have to keep the bigger kids from monopolizing it!
customer_reviews.author: LJ Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I still need to use the Velcro strip that it came with so that it can stay in one place. With that done, it'll be even better. It takes up little space and my 2 sons use it just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Milliard Soft Foam Toddler Stairs and Ramp Climber Gym Toy - Great for Climbing, Sliding, Crawling and Physical Activity for Kids and Children
feature_bullets: Finally, your child has something safe to climb, slide and crawl on that won’t get them into trouble! This soft slide is a great way for toddlers to explore and improve gross motor skills and increase physical activity.
Great for use in playrooms or classrooms. Vinyl cover is durable, stain resistant easy to clean with a damp cloth and soap.
Soft, but firm polyurethane foam shapes are covered with phthalate and lead free vinyl in bright colors that kids will love.
Can be used together or separated for added functionality. Hook-and-Look strip connects the two pieces safely with no buttons or hard fasteners to poke or snag.
The product complies with ASTM F963-17 to create a safe environment for children. Parts individually measure 20”L x 20"W x 10”H. Slide safely!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars655 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
